communication.client module¶

class communication.client.Client(host, port)[source]¶

Bases: communication.socket_manager.SocketManager

Client object that handles socket logic for outgoing connections.

Parameters:
  • host – The address of the host.
  • port – The port to open.
connect()[source]¶

Connects the client’s socket to the given address.

Raises:ClientException – A client exception is raised when the client was unable to connect at the given host and port.
